name: Colourizz: City Taxi
description:
Welcome to GridEyePIX's page!

Super easy to control and fun to play this little minimalist taxi car game!

Use your driving skills to navigate busy roads to reach destinations under limited time. Find the best route possible, save time and gain coins! Spend all the coins to get more speed, smoother manoeuvre and stronger brake! You will need it. ;)

Features: Autosave game data, Customizable touch controls, Upgrade the taxi, 2 challenging game modes.

Play this game using mouse clicks on touch areas, touches  on touch screen devices or use keyboard LEFT and RIGHT buttons to steer, UP button to accelerate and DOWN button to brake.

If you want to know more visit grideyepix.com website !

Make sure you comment your(real) best time result ;) !

Enjoy and Have fun! :)
